Install packages
```{r}
install.packages("imager", dependencies=TRUE)
install.packages("magick")
```

load the image
```{r}
library("imager")
img <- load.image("showmewhatugot.png")
img

```

```{r}
library("magick")
img <- image_read("showmewhatugot.png")
img2 <- image_read("showmewhatugot.jpg")
image_info(img)
image_info(img2)
```
